name: Art Hunt
description:
A one-week prototype for the GSAS 4510 Experimental Game Design course at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute. The theme of this project is "Generative AI". This game (including game design, source code, and art assets) was made mostly using ChatGPT and other AI bots (list can be found here), with minor tweaks and scene setup done by yours truly.

Sources

  • Sedgewick Ave Display font by Pedgro Vergani and Kevin Burke
  • Mr. Detective BGM by VOiD1 Gaming
  • Sound Effects by Game Sound Solutions
  • All other assets and source code by AI generators and Corppet (details above)
